name: Endless Sack of Gold
effect:
:instant: Gain 5 :gold:.

— OR —

:instant: Remove this card, then gain 8 :gold:.
flavor_text: A little leprechaun dances gleefully around a magical sack. Seeing you approach, he stops in mid-stride. The little man screams and stamps his foot ferociously, vanishing into thin air. Remembering the old leprechaun saying, 'Finders Keepers', you grab the sack and leave.
